subject: Order #SSN4403
description_text:
Hi

I am just wondering whats happening with
Order #SSN4403?

Last update where 5:e december with

One item in your order is on the way.

Now I have gotten two emails about how it went and how the product worked but it hasn't been delivered yet.

There is no update at all when you use the tracking number.
It only says "The following waybills have not been collected or have been shipped for more than 3 months:SF6047131081183"

Best regards
Martin

Sent from [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/mail/home) for Android.

conversations.body_text: Hi Martin. arman,   Latest production update: The HS Pro shifter will be shipped on December 29. The schedule was slightly delayed due to issues with components before shipment.       SF Express • SF6047197778228
